ResearchProjectDef.label: Manifest Thought
ResearchProjectDef.description: Your powers have become so powerful, and so very villainous, that you can you feel your thoughts shaping reality itself. With just a bit more thinking you might be able to bring the whole world under your control, but strain too much and you might erase yourself from existence.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Manifest Doubt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manifest manipulation skills so powerful you begin to manipulate yourself into believing you're not powerful enough. Combined with Manifest Trauma, you might subconciously erase yourself from existence entirely.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Manifest Trauma
ResearchProjectDef.description: Lose yourself in the trauma from the experiments performed on you and desperately make it end by any means necessary! Combined with Manifest Doubt, you might subconciously erase yourself from existence entirely.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Manifest Control
ResearchProjectDef.description: Focus your will and exert it across the whole world! Combined with Manifest Doctrine, you will be able to project your beliefs across the whole planet and dominate the world!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Manifest Doctrine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the art of manipulating the beliefs of others to align with your own! Combined with Manifest Control, you will be able to project your beliefs across the whole planet and dominate the world!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wandering Thoughts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Wandering thoughts and ideas that don't quite fit anywhere else. They're not particularly useful, but they're not harmful either. You make no progress towards either victory or failure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Subconscious Distractions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Subconcious distractions stand in the way of your grand plan. You make no progress towards either victory or failure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Environmental Annoyances
ResearchProjectDef.description: Environmental annoyances pull you out of your focus. You make no progress towards either victory or failure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Performance Anxiety
ResearchProjectDef.description: Performance anxiety prevents you from really getting into the world domination mood. You make no progress towards either victory or failure.
